resources.string: This app was written to assist possible entrepreneurs in finding a possible and workable niche in the economy. The process starts with searching your initial idea, such as 'ridesharing' or 'cloud storage'. The app will then look at other companies invested in this idea and give you the insight to decide if the market is enterable or not.
This app is courtesy of: Bridget Corcoran becorc01@vt.edu Aarathi Raghuraman aarathiraghuraman@gmail.com
